SQL.LOAD: SELECT trans_dtl_claim_update_2gvs_id, xml_part_description_code, xml_part_cost, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, trans_dtl_parts_appr_id FROM elp_trans_dtl_part_approval WHERE trans_dtl_parts_appr_id = :trans_dtl_parts_appr_id
